unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Hope he's back soon for the Asia Cup! Remember how Chahal got injured during IPL? These setbacks are real *Darr* moments, like in the SRK movie. Heard Pandya's also got a niggle. BCCI better have good physios, maybe from AIIMS! Hoping for quick recovery for all the players, especially with the World Cup round the corner. India needs them all, fit as fiddles. No "Kal Ho Naa Ho" scenarios, please! Let's win this, yaar!
